turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i assist you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me with ordering pizza from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure! how many pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like three medium pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what kind of toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the first one, I would like just plain pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: On the second pizza, I would like ham and pineapple.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And with the third pizza, I would like chicken Barbecue.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what type of crust do you prefer?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Just regular regular crust is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: any other special instruction?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. Could you put extra cheese on those pizzas?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, that is $2.50 per pizza, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that's fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 3 medium pizzas. a pepperoni, the second is with ham and pineapple and the third is chicken bbq. extra cheese on all 3. did i get that correctly?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome! your total will be $43.50 plus tax.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great. Thank you so much for putting that in for me.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're very welcome! your pizzas will be ready for pickup at bela luna's soon.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome! enjoy! bye bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will. Thank you. Bye.
